Docs.summary: Represents a logical group of controls as they appear on a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ribbon groups resize independently of one another to layout their controls in the largest available space.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCollapsed As Boolean
public: property bool IsCollapsed { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the ribbon group is collapsed.
Docs.value: if the group is collapsed; otherwise, . The registered default is . For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks In the collapsed state, a ribbon group looks and behaves like a menu button. The following illustration shows a ribbon with the **Clipboard**, **Paragraph**, and **Insert** groups in their collapsed state. When a group is collapsed into a menu button, its largest size variation is shown when the drop-down is opened. ![Ribbon with collapsed groups](~/add/media/wpfribbon-small.png "Ribbon with collapsed groups") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeyTip { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.KeyTip : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the control.
Docs.value: The keyboard shortcut for the control. The registered default is . For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. KeyTips appear on the when you press the ALT key. ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
